project.description: Build GTK Cairo library, including dependencies

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LIBCAIRO_TARBALL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Full filename of the tarball file; used when downloading, and when checking to see if it's already been downloaded

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LIBPIXMAN_TARBALL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Full filename of the tarball file; used when downloading, and when checking to see if it's already been downloaded

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FOO_BAR
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Full filename of the tarball file; used when downloading, and when checking to see if it's already been downloaded

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
## UPDATE JENKINS-CFG cd $HOME/src/jenkins-cfg.git git pull
echo "libpixman version is ${_LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}" echo "libpixman tarball is ${LIBPIXMAN_TARBALL}" echo "foobar is ${FOO_BAR}"

## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE LIBPIXMAN
# always unpack fresh source if [ -d pixman-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf pixman-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION} fi
tar -zxvf $SOURCE_DIR/$LIBPIXMAN_TARBALL
cd pixman-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}
# now run Configure echo "Current directory is: $(pwd)" ./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/pixman-${LIPIXMAN_VERSION}-bin
## BUILD AND TEST LIBPIXMAN cd cairo-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION} time make time make test time make install

## UNPACK AND CONFIGURE LIBCAIRO
# always unpack fresh source if [ -d cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION} ]; then rm -rf cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION} fi
# -J == xz compression tar -Jxvf $SOURCE_DIR/$LIBCAIRO_TARBALL
cd cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION}
# now run Configure echo "Current directory is: $(pwd)" ./configure --prefix=${WORKSPACE}/cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION}-bin \ --enable-xlib --enable-png
## BUILD AND TEST LIBCAIRO cd cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION} time make time make test time make install

## ARCHIVE BINARY BUILDS # -J == xz compression
# pixman cd $WORKSPACE/pixman-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}-bin tar -cJvf $WORKSPACE/libpixman-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}.artifact.tar.xz .
# cairo cd $WORKSPACE/cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION}-bin tar -cJvf $WORKSPACE/libcairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION}.artifact.tar.xz .

## DELETE BUILD DIRS
# pixman rm -rf $WORKSPACE/pixman-${LIBPIXMAN_VERSION}-bin
# cairo rm -rf $WORKSPACE/cairo-${LIBCAIRO_VERSION}-bin
